Name: SIMPLE GAME
About the game: Simple platformer with simple and minimalistic design. The game has: -clear and familiar to all management. -40 levels. -many obstacles and traps. -personal statistics about your skill in the game. -secrets and hidden rooms. In order to play the game you need to know that : objects blue is a solid body. -you can interact with green objects or they are safe. -red is a dangerous object. -yellow are safe objects , but there are dangerous objects near them.
